name: Geeksos
description: Survive in a city controlled by a game corporation. Residents have to buy DLC for every unfinished product, developers are forced to make endless sequels, and lootboxes are now sold even at the grocery store. Stop the madness or join it in the cybernetic stealth-shooter Geeksos.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: 64bit Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 / AMD FX-6300 Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: Realtek High Definition Audio Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
